text: Vahan Bichakhchyan (; born 9 July 1999) is an Armenian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Slovak club MŠK Žilina and Armenia. ==MŠK Žilina== In July 2017, Bichakhchyan signed a five-year contract with Žilina. Bichakhchyan made his Fortuna Liga debut for Žilina against Slovan Bratislava on 24 February 2018. Žilina had suffered a 0-6 defeat and Bichakchyan had entered 8 minutes before the end of the game, replacing Miroslav Káčer.ŠK Slovan Bratislava - MŠK Žilina 24.02.2018, futbalnet.sk ==References== ==External links== * *MŠK Žilina official club profile *Fortuna Liga profile *Futbalnet profile Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Gyumri Category:Armenian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Armenia international footballers Category:Armenia under-21 international footballers Category:Armenia youth international footballers Category:Armenian expatriate footballers Category:FC Shirak players Category:MŠK Žilina players Category:Armenian Premier League players Category:Slovak Super Liga players Category:Expatriate footballers in Slovakia Category:Armenian expatriate sportspeople in Slovakia
title: Vahan Bichakhchyan
